articles.author: Megan Shersby
articles.title: The human-sized African bird that eats baby crocodiles and kills its siblings - Livescience.com
articles.description: Shoebills reach up to 5 feet in height and they are formidable ambush predators, standing still in swamps before lunging forward to swallow their prey whole with their giant bills.
articles.content:
Name: Shoebill (Balaeniceps rex)
Where it lives: Marshes and swamps in East Africa 
What it eats: Fish and reptiles
Why it's awesome: This menacing and prehistoric-looking bird can grow up to 5 fe… [+1728 chars]
